metadata.title: Rogue Valley Shooting Sports Association | Jackson County Sports Park
metadata.description: Managing the Jackson County Sports Park Shooting Complex. Open daily from 8:00 AM until approximately 30 to 45 minutes before sunset.

hero.title: Rogue Valley Shooting Sports Association
hero.subtitle: Managing the Jackson County Sports Park Shooting Complex

about.title: Welcome to RVSSA
paragraphs: The Rogue Valley Shooting Sports Association manages the Jackson County Sports Park Shooting Complex, providing a safe and welcoming environment for shooting sports enthusiasts of all skill levels.
Open Daily, from 8:00 AM until approximately 30 to 45 minutes before sunset. A range officer will be present during all hours of operation.

features.title: Safety First
features.description: Safety is our top priority. All visitors must follow our range safety rules to ensure a safe environment for everyone.

features.title: Range Facilities
features.description: We offer multiple shooting ranges including rifle, pistol, and archery facilities for shooters of all skill levels.

features.title: Fees & Membership
features.description: Daily gate entry fee of $5.00 per shooter. Yearly passes available for individuals ($45) and families ($60).

gallery.title: Our Shooting Ranges
gallery.subtitle: Explore our facilities designed for various shooting disciplines

contact.title: Visit Us Today
contact.subtitle: Located at the Jackson County Sports Park in White City, Oregon
contact.address: Jackson County Sports Park, White City, OR
contact.hours: Daily, from 8:00 AM until approximately 30 to 45 minutes before sunset
contact.additionalInfo: If you are at the range and have a problem, you can call the front gate for assistance.
